item.title: 【Inside STL: Waiting for a std::atomic<std::shared_ptr<T>> to change, part 1】STL 内部：等待 std::atomic<std::shared_ptr<T>> 更改，第 1 部分
item.description: 【Waiting on a single pointer, but checking for two.】等待一个指针，但检查两个指针​​。

item.title: 【Gesellschaft zur Stärkung der Verben: The German Society for the Irregularization of Verbs】动词强化学会：德国动词不规则化学会
【Important Update: blog migration to quantum.microsoft.com】重要更新：博客迁移到Quantum.microsoft.com
item.description: 【We are excited to announce that the Q# blog will be migrating to a new home at Azure Quantum in Feb 2025. This move will allow us to provide you with a more integrated and enhanced experience, featuring the latest updates and resources in the world of quantum computing. Stay tuned for more details and […]】我们很高兴地宣布，Q# 博客将于 2025 年 2 月迁移到 Azure Quantum 的新家。此举将使我们能够为您提供更加集成和增强的体验，其中包括世界各地的最新更新和资源。量子计算。请继续关注更多详细信息和 [...]

item.title: 【Building a RAG-Based Smart Memory Application with Azure SQL Database】使用 Azure SQL 数据库构建基于 RAG 的智能内存应用程序
item.description: 【Project Mission The way people work and manage information is changing rapidly in our digital age. More and more people are struggling to keep track of all the online resources they use daily. They need a better way to save, organize, and retrieve important information from websites, articles, and other online sources. This is especially […]】项目使命 在数字时代，人们工作和管理信息的方式正在迅速变化。越来越多的人正在努力跟踪他们每天使用的所有在线资源。他们需要一种更好的方法来保存、组织和检索网站、文章和其他在线资源中的重要信息。这尤其是[…]

item.title: 【Free Plan Support for GitHub Copilot Available on JetBrains IDEs】JetBrains IDE 上提供对 GitHub Copilot 的免费计划支持
item.description: 【Hello, developers! Welcome to our very first blog post dedicated to GitHub Copilot Plugin for JetBrains IDEs in 2025. We are excited to share that the new Free Plan for GitHub Copilot has been available for everyone on JetBrains IDEs! Whether you use IntelliJ IDEA (Ultimate, Community, Educational), PyCharm(Professional, Community, Educational), WebStorm, PhpStorm, Rider, or […]】开发者们大家好！欢迎来到我们第一篇专门介绍 2025 年适用于 JetBrains IDE 的 GitHub Copilot 插件的博客文章。我们很高兴与大家分享，JetBrains IDE 上的每个人都可以使用新的 GitHub Copilot 免费计划！无论您使用 IntelliJ IDEA（终极版、社区版、教育版）、PyCharm（专业版、社区版、教育版）、WebStorm、PhpStorm、Rider 还是 [...]

item.title: 【.NET Aspire Quick Tip – Managing Container & Data Lifetime】.NET Aspire 快速提示 – 管理容器和数据生命周期
item.description: 【.NET Aspire 9 adds new control over the lifetime of containers on your local developer environment. Let's look at how to manage them with the new APIs!】.NET Aspire 9 添加了对本地开发人员环境中容器生命周期的新控制。让我们看看如何使用新的 API 来管理它们！

item.title: 【SQL Server Native Vector Search for .NET Developers】面向 .NET 开发人员的 SQL Server 本机矢量搜索
item.description: 【It seems that the majority of developers naturally believe this field of software development belongs to mathematics and Python developers, who originally started building the first solutions. However, .NET and C# provide a great foundation for building almost any kind of application on any platform in a highly professional way. In this post, we will […]】似乎大多数开发人员自然地认为这个软件开发领域属于数学和 Python 开发人员，他们最初开始构建第一个解决方案。然而，.NET 和 C# 为以高度专业的方式在任何平台上构建几乎任何类型的应用程序提供了良好的基础。在这篇文章中，我们将[...]

item.title: 【Benchmarking with Visual Studio Profiler】使用 Visual Studio Profiler 进行基准测试
item.description: 【In Visual Studio 17.13 Preview we have released our updated BenchmarkDotNet diagnosers, allowing you to use more of the tools in the performance profiler to analyze benchmarks. With this change it is super quick to dig into CPU usage and allocations of benchmarks making the measure, change, measure cycle quick and efficient. Benchmarking a real […]】在 Visual Studio 17.13 预览版中，我们发布了更新的 BenchmarkDotNet 诊断程序，允许您使用性能分析器中的更多工具来分析基准。通过此更改，可以非常快速地深入了解 CPU 使用情况和基准分配，从而使测量、更改、测量周期快速高效。基准测试真实的[...]

item.title: 【azd CDN changing January 2025】azd CDN 将于 2025 年 1 月发生变化
item.description: 【This blog post makes customers aware of a critical Content Delivery Network (CDN) change for azd (the Azure Developer CLI) because the CDN provider is changing from Edgio to Azure Front Door.】此博文让客户了解 azd（Azure 开发人员 CLI）的关键内容交付网络 (CDN) 更改，因为 CDN 提供商正在从 Edgio 更改为 Azure Front Door。

item.title: 【Emergency power resets on Lenovo, HP, Dell, and Acer laptops】Lenovo、HP、Dell 和 Acer 笔记本电脑的紧急电源重置
item.description: 【Looking for the magic button.】寻找神奇的按钮。
